page.shortlink: api desktop api ui get query name function
page.description: The UI_GET_QUERY_NAME() function prompts for the name of a saved Query operation.
page.syntax: Query_Name as C = ui_get_query_name(C table_set_name [,C default_choice [,C style [,C title ]]])

argument.name: Query_Name
argument.description: The name of the query returned by the function.

argument.name: table_set_name
argument.description: The table or set on which the query operates.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.
